transcript.text: watch alone
shabbat shalom this is daniel john lee
with tour restoration ministries had a
wonderful skype fellowship tonight
enjoyed fellowship with three
individuals from ontario different parts
of ontario greg and cole and ted and it
was a good time of praise and worship of
prayer and we got into some very sort of
intimate prophetic stuff i guess is the
best way to say it but anyway it was a
wonderful fellowship we fellowship for
about two hours tonight and just want to
let everyone know that tomorrow's
sabbath service is going to be at noon
pacific time 12pm pacific 3 p.m. eastern
because that just works out better for
everyone that was in the group tonight
so tomorrow's shabbat service will be a
noon 12 p.m. pacific 3 p.m. eastern and
then we'll be having a closing of
shabbat at seven p.m. that night 10
this is daniel john lee with tour
restoration ministries websites ww
spirit or calm shabbat shalom
